name: lrnr
description: The LRNR app uses the Perplexity API to generate custom quizzes based on user input. Originally built using jQuery and Go, this project is a full refactor into a Node.js and React stack.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run preview --prefix client" "npm run start --prefix server"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
